i would play this game still but well, it's boring sometimes
you can mod the game yourself add zombie modes and etc but at the end it's just boring...
i do recommend you the game but it doesn't work for me the way it might work for you, you could have limitless fun while i could enjoy the game for an hour only.

Good Ol' Classic. Used to be my favorite game growing up.
Simple, lightweight, challenging, fast paced, immediate.

The game is a good old first person shooter. The only thing is, it's difficult to find a server that has no mods and dosen't download a bunch of weird stuff on your computer and has people playing it. If you have a ton of friends who also have this game, then it will be much better.
Nostalgia, am copilarit cu jocul asta ! :D Nota 10 chiar daca au trecut anii peste el.
